Module ehubicka.scheduler
Package ehubicka.Controller

Class AddCustomer

java.lang.Object
ehubicka.Controller.AddCustomer
public class AddCustomer extends Object
This class will add a customer record to the database. Users will be prompted to enter various information not including a customer ID which will be generated automatically. Upon saving the customer, it will be displayed in the mainscreen customers tableview.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Used to initialize the controller with any code that needs to be implemented when this screen is accessed. The combo boxes will be populated with choices to select.

    • onCancelClick

      public void onCancelClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Discard the customer to be added and takes the user back to the mainscreen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - when the cancel button is pressed.
      Throws:
      IOException - most likely if FXMLLoader.load() can't find the .fxml file.

    • onSaveClick

      public void onSaveClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Input from the user (minus a customer ID which will be automatically generated) will be added as a record in the database. The user will then be taken to the mainscreen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - when the save button is pressed.
      Throws:
      IOException - most likely if FXMLLoader.load() can't find the .fxml file.

    • countryComboBoxOnAction

      public void countryComboBoxOnAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Filter divisions combo box based on which country is selected. For example, only US states will be available to be selected when the country combo box is selected as US.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - when the country combo box detects a selection change.
      Throws:
      IOException - most likely if the database cannot be accessed.
